abstract.para: This section describes the different options for installing a &sleha; cluster, and includes links to the available installation guides.

topic.para: The following quick start guides explain how to set up a minimal cluster with default settings:

listitem.para: This quick start guide describes how to set up a basic two-node &ha; cluster with &qdevice;, diskless &sbd; and a software watchdog. &qdevice; is required for this setup so that diskless &sbd; can handle split-brain scenarios for the two-node cluster.

link.citetitle: Installing a basic three-node High Availability cluster

listitem.para: This quick start guide describes how to set up a basic three-node &ha; cluster with diskless &sbd; and a software watchdog. Three nodes are required for this setup so that diskless &sbd; can handle split-brain scenarios without the help of &qdevice;.
